testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Edge browser..............................................passed When User opens URL "https://demo.guru99.com/test/newtours/"................passed When User click on Register link............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Register: Mercury Tours".........................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And click on Submit button..................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "sign-in"...........................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
